title: Bridging the Political Divide
description: In an acrid political climate, it's vital to keep clients' family ties from fraying, say Michael Tiedemann and Jill Shipley of Tiedemann Advisors.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: In an acrid political climate, it's vital to keep clients' family ties from fraying, say Michael Tiedemann and Jill Shipley of Tiedemann Advisors.
